== 1. My Setup ==
==== 1.1 Hardware I Have ====
* Computer: '''Sager NP6260'''
* RAM: 1.5GB (512MB on board, 1GB in slot)
* Hard Drive: SAMSUNG MP0804H (80GB @ 5400rpm)
* LCD: /!\
* Chip: Intel Core Solo Processor Ultra Low Voltage (5.5W) U1400 (1.2GHz w/2,048k L2 On-die cache 533MHz FSB)
* Optical Drive: MATSHITA DVD-RAM UJ-842S (Combo Dual Layer DVD +/-R/RW 5x and 24x CD-R/RW)
* Wireless: (802.11 a/b/g using Intel PRO/Wireless 3945)
* Bluetooth: /!\
* Fingerprint-Reader: /!\
==== 1.2 Operating System Installed ====
* Ubuntu 8.10 Intrepid Ibex

== 2. Problems ==
==== 2.1 Solutions ====
* Wireless - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=423959|Thread]]</nowiki> (./)
* DVD playback totem - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Feisty#How_to_add_extra_repositories|Add Repositories]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Feisty#How_to_install_DVD_playback_capability|Play DVDs]]</nowiki> (./)
* Firefox video plugins - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuguide.org/wiki/Ubuntu:Feisty#MPlayer_plug-in_.28Installs_MPlayer_media_player_as_well.29|HowTo]]</nowiki> (./)
* MicroSD adapter - Replaced motherboard under warranty (./)
* Boot time for "Configuring Network Interfaces" - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=31198|Workaround for Feisty]]</nowiki> (./)
* Maximizing windows with Compiz-Fusion - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/compiz/+bug/210022|Bug #210022]]</nowiki> (./)
* Open as admin (nautilus-gksu) not installing correctly - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gksu/+bug/201462|Bug #201462]]</nowiki> (./)
* AWN startup option in settings - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/awn/+bug/235027|Bug #235027]]</nowiki> (./)
* Must put wireless network keyring password in every time you login - <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=5138596&postcount=16|Instructions on how to remove password]]</nowiki> (./)
* ACPI error makes for slow boot - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/215179|Bug #215179]]</nowiki> (./)
* Workspace Switcher is ineffectual when Compiz is enabled - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/compiz/+bug/267481|Bug #267481]]</nowiki> (./)
* Spellchecker in Text Editor incomplete - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gedit/+bug/282769|Bug #282769]]</nowiki> (./)
* Edge of screen clicking with Compiz-Fusion - <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/compiz/+bug/103306|Bug #103306]]</nowiki> (./)
